reviewtext: The network component on my old Intel MB was not supported by Windows 2008 Server R2.  I ordered this card to enable me to use the MB with Windows Server 2008 R2.  It works perfectly.  Card is recognized on install and driver loaded automatically.  Later, I upgraded to Windows Server 2012 and the card works perfectly with that version of the server product also.  Easy to install, and didn't have to bother with the install CD.
